title: I WAS SENT A SKIN I ALREADY HAD (MYSTERY SKIN)
body: i got send amythist ashe when i already had that skin and i got nothing i didnt even get the popup saying mystery gift when i was in skype while my friend did it and he shared screens and we can see it on his gifting history    please  fix this and send me a new mystery skin thanks

replies.body: We recently enabled toast notifications on the updated client, so you're seeing a backlog of old messages.  You'll see a few notices of items you already received, so alas there is nothing new.  The last gift you received appears to be in October of last year.  You did send a gift today but that was for Blood Moon Yasuo to another player.  Let me know if that clears things up!
oh yeah i dont use the new client i use the old one
can you check my friend that sent me the skin his name is -snip-       he is the one i sent the yasuo skin and he sent me the mystery skin can you check that it sent? his name is -snip-

Information has updated on my side to show that you received the gift, but I don't see any errors here.  Meaning I wasn't able to see that the account had Amethyst Ashe unlocked before.  

If you need anymore context, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can help.  Due to the nature of sharing billing info, I'd rather it's done individually in your ticket and not through a public venue.  For that reason I've snipped out the summoner name in your post.  We'll get back to you!
